'''Vanana''' is an open-world [[Tatankasaurus]] [[NPC]] located in {{Location|"Collective of Plenty"}}. She is [[Varesa]]'s [[Saurian]] companion.

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
''Attempt to enter [[Varesa's Orchard]] before reaching step 4 of [[Orchard Repose]]''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{Black Screen|As the Tatankasaurus on guard is strongly opposed, you have no choice but to leave...}}
:'''Vanana:''' Roohrr... Wroo!
:'''Paimon:''' Seems like that orchard's private property. That Tatankasaurus sure isn't letting anyone in there.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
''Talk to Vanana while indwelling a Saurian before reaching step 4 of Orchard Repose''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Vanana:''' My job, protect Varesa's orchard. Sorry, thanks for understanding.
:'''Vanana:''' Some people good, some people bad. Sometimes hard to tell, so I use strength instead.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #3===
''Talk to Vanana while indwelling a Saurian after reaching step 4 of Orchard Repose''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Vanana:''' This is Varesa's orchard... Must keep safe. No bad people or saurians allowed in.
:'''Vanana:''' But you smell different. Very berry good friends, eat as much as fruit as they like, no problem! Full tummy is happy tummy &mdash; Varesa says so too.
{{Dialogue End}}
